title: Open source implementations for stacked fractions in OTL
content:
[https://github.com/TiroTypeworks/Nutso](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417083838/https:/github.com/TiroTypeworks/Nutso "https://github.com/TiroTypeworks/Nutso")

Two related implementations for handling arbitrary vertically stacked fractions in OpenType Layout. These are licensed under the Apache 2.0 license, so can be used in non-open licensed fonts.
author: John Hudson

comments.content: This made me wonder, are there any public repositories that collect OTL solutions?
As an aggregator of such things from multiple sources? Not that I know of. Each of us has been publishing our stuff independently.
